title: Athletism — Striking (Elite) — Phase 4: Max Strength — Intensification
equipment: Heavy bag, pads, focus mitts, kick shield
Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Protective gear (gloves, wraps, shin guards, mouthpiece)
goal: Heavier loads, fewer reps, eccentric control. Maintain technique.

cooldown: Soft tissue release 10' (foam roll, lacrosse ball)

notes: Week 1: 4x4. Week 2: 5x3 heavy. Add bag intervals.
